mapper.select: SELECT dpno, dpkind, dpsymptom, dpkeyword, dpexample FROM department
SELECT h.* FROM hospitalList_view h WHERE h.dtelehealth = 1
SELECT h.* FROM hospitalList_view h WHERE #{kindKeyword} = h.dpkind AND h.dtelehealth = 1
SELECT h.* FROM hospitalList_view h WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{symptomKeyword}, h.dpkeyword) AND h.dtelehealth = 1
SELECT h.* FROM hospitalList_view h WHERE h.dname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND h.dtelehealth = 1
SELECT h.*, COALESCE(COUNT(t.dno), 0) as count FROM hospitalList_view h LEFT JOIN telehealth t ON h.dno = t.dno WHERE h.dno = #{dno}

SELECT r.rno, r.mno, DATE_FORMAT(r.rdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS rdate, r.rrate, r.rcontent, r.rkeyword, r.rlike, r.dno, r.hno, m.mname FROM review r JOIN member m ON m.mno = r.mno WHERE r.dno = #{dno} ORDER BY rdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (mno,rrate,rcontent,rkeyword,dno,hno) VALUES (#{mno},#{rrate},#{rcontent},#{rkeyword},#{dno}, (SELECT hno FROM hospitalList_view WHERE dno=#{dno}))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review r WHERE r.rno = #{rno}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN rrate = '5' THEN 1 END) AS veryGood, COUNT(CASE WHEN rrate = '4' THEN 1 END) AS good, COUNT(CASE WHEN rrate = '3' THEN 1 END) AS normal, COUNT(CASE WHEN rrate = '2' THEN 1 END) AS bad, COUNT(CASE WHEN rrate = '1' THEN 1 END) AS veryBad FROM review WHERE dno =#{dno}
